Html: I need to only include a short list of the GMapProviders list how do i do this in c#
You have to do it manually, by selecting the GMapProviders that you want and put them in a combobox for example.

skyhikeeper wrote:
I need to only include a short list of the GMapProviders list how do i do this in c#
I think, you open source code, file name is GMapProviders.cs, then REM some Provider you dont want, then recompile, like below:
    public static readonly BingMapProvider BingMap = BingMapProvider.Instance;
    public static readonly BingSatelliteMapProvider BingSatelliteMap = BingSatelliteMapProvider.Instance;
